titleStmt.title: A proclamation, anent the discovery of persons in arms, and apprehending rebels and fugitives.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the eighth day of July, one thousand six hundred eighty two years. And of Our Reign, the thirtieth and fourth year.
Signed: Will. Paterson, Cl. Sti. Concilij.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
